text: Is it possible to disable this edit button on custom email templates. Authors are overriding system settings that are different from the agreed corporate guidelines. So we have to keep changing them back and forth.

Hey Jacob, im looking into this internally right now. I dont think we have anything settings wise that could accomplish this. Thought a Custom Module might help with this.

One quick clarifying question, do you have more than one office location for users to choose from? If you only have one, you may able to work around this using a Custom Module to essentially remove people from editing the footer contents.
Big fan of MJML. We're working towards having all our templates in HTML produced through the MJML compilation process
